column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I got the "cha cha cha garlic lovers" ramen
column2: hmm maybe my buzzed kicked in
column3: but i don't remember even tasting garlic in it
column4: but I love garlic. So a little bit ain't going to hype my taste buds. It's not super garlicky
column5: but it was freaking delicious. I wish they would let me sub the thick noodles for some thin ones
column6: bc I'm not about the "getting full off noodles" life. I like to eat multiple different things. The meat in the ramen was not as tender as it normally is this time around.
